divs: Sighting DetailsWell my father was traveling to eagle pass texas when he and his wife saw something very shiny in the sky hovering and was puzzled what it could be and that's when he told his wife to take a picture with his phone....And that's when he came home and showed me I sent it in a txt message to my phone and zoomed in and showed him and he was shocked to see that it showed a disc shape and he said when he saw it when he was driving it look like a shiny orb like balloon shape ....And as I look at it I am baffled to what it is cause I haven't seen anything like it...
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Eagle Pass
There was one other sighting in Eagle Pass on or around July 29th 2013
Summary: was driving and sight seeing notice something hovering looking like a round shiny object in the sky
